title: Associação Desportiva Guarabira
text:
Associação Desportiva Guarabira, commonly known as Desportiva Guarabira, is a Brazilian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Guarabira">Guarabira</a>, <a href="Para%C3%ADba">Paraíba state</a>.
History.
The club was founded on May 2, 2005, after <a href="Guarabira%20Esporte%20Clube">Guarabira Esporte Clube</a> folded. Desportiva Guarabira won the <a href="Campeonato%20Paraibano%20%28lower%20levels%29">Campeonato Paraibano Second Level</a> in 2009.
Stadium.
Associação Desportiva Guarabira play their home games at <a href="Est%C3%A1dio%20Municipal%20S%C3%ADlvio%20Porto">Estádio Municipal Sílvio Porto</a>. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 3,000 people.
